t1.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
t1.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane

t2.description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
t2.cast: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum

t3.description: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
t3.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page

t4.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
t4.cast: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson

t5.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
t5.cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

t6.description: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident which leaves them alone in space.
t6.cast: Sandra Bullock, George Clooney, Ed Harris

t7.description: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a 'Super-Soldier serum'. But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.
t7.cast: Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Samuel L. Jackson

t8.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.
t8.cast: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd

t9.description: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants..
t9.cast: Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Hugh Jackman

t10.description: While waiting for their big breaks, two proper L.A. dreamers, a suavely- charming, soft-spoken jazz pianist and a brilliant, vivacious playwright, attempt to reconcile aspirations and relationship in a magical old-school romance.
t10.cast: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Rosemarie DeWitt
